<p>
HEADQUARTERS ARMY OF THE UNITED STATES, 
</p><p>
Aug. 25, <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?year=1881">1881</a>. 
</p><p>
Dear Brother : The President's condition is now absolutely critical, and surely many days cannot now pass 
without some turn. He is so weak now that he cannot 
endure a relapse. . . . 
</p><p>
Yours affectionately, 
</p><p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=wts" rel="me">W. T. SHERMAN</a>. 
</p>
